name: 3D FPS Survive
description:
That's a FPS game with 10 levels. Each level is not the same and includes different guns, ammos, enemies etc... When you kill all your opponents, then you complete level and you will reach to the next level. In some levels are bosses to. There are 3 bosses.

KEYBOARD BUTTONS : W, S, A, D - Moving, E - Pick up weapons, R - Reload weapons

1, 2, 3, 4, 5 - Different weapons

MOUSE MOVE for look around, Left mouse button - Shooting

You can buy whole asset store project to.

LINK to ASSET STORE : BUY 3D FPS Survive (Full Project) - ASSET STORE

MY WEBSITE : MY WEBSITE
